alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 11:07AM EDT until April 21 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Hazleton and Petersburg. .Rainfall amounts last Wednesday of one to two inches across much of central Indiana...has left lowland and minor flooding along lower portions of the White River. Flooding is expected to end near Petersburg and Hazleton by mid week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Flood waters cover the Hazleton softball field. Pottsville Road is underwater and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 7.1 feet Thursday, April 28. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
